channel.title: CVE Feed for QualitySoft Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QualitySoft Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20713|2024-08-03T17:53:21.240Z -- qualitysoft%20corporation -- qnd%20advance%2Fpremium%2Fstandard
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in QND Advance/Premium/Standard Ver.11.0.4i and earlier allows an attacker who can log in to the PC where the product's Windows client is installed to gain administrative privileges via unspecified vectors. As a result, sensitive information may be altered/obtained or unintended operations may be performed.
